channel.title: Can't get server online!
channel.description:
Hey,
When I ran my server, i checked to see if it was online using a status checker. It said it was online, but when I sent my friend the client, they said that they had the "error connecting to the server" message. Can anybody help me please?
I'm positive that I put the right IP in the Client.Java and GUI, so I don't think its that. Could it be my no-ip?
P.s. I forgot to mention that I can connect, but they can't.

item.title: Can't get server online!
item.dc:creator: @NickIceypvp NickIceypvp
item.description:
@NickIceypvp wrote:

Hey,

When I ran my server, i checked to see if it was online using a status checker. It said it was online, but when I sent my friend the client, they said that they had the “error connecting to the server” message. Can anybody help me please?

I’m positive that I put the right IP in the Client.Java and GUI, so I don’t think its that. Could it be my no-ip?

P.s. I forgot to mention that I can connect, but they can’t.

Read full topic
